page.title: 03Employment
page.content:
The largest employer in Lochgelly is Andrew Antennas, a multi-national company with the main branch in Chicago, U.S.A. Andrew Antennas began production in Lochgelly in 1966 near the B.R station and moved to its present site in "The Avenue" where it occupies 9940 sq. metres. The works use an IBM computer to control operations. The 230 men are concerned with the manufacture and installation of aerials for customers all over the world. 20 woman are employed on mainly secretarial duties.
{ cont/.
